TemplateSQL.FixedSQL: SET NOCOUNT ON /******************************************************/ /* T_AD_SUB 서브배너 조회 - SELECT QUERY GetAdSubList */ /******************************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED DECLARE @AD_CODE BIGINT = {0} SELECT A.IDX , A.AD_CODE , A.SEQ , A.IMG_URL , A.TITLE , A.RELATION , A.CONTENT , A.REG_NAME , A.REMARK , A.INSERT_CODE , A.INSERT_DATE , A.UPDATE_CODE , B.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , A.UPDATE_DATE FROM T_AD_SUB A INNER JOIN T_MEMBER B ON A.UPDATE_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE WHERE AD_CODE = @AD_CODE ORDER BY AD_CODE, SEQ SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /************************************************/ /* 서브배너테이블 - T_AD_SUB 저장 - SAVE QUERY */ /************************************************/ DECLARE @IDX INT = N'{0}' , @AD_CODE BIGINT = CONVERT(BIGINT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{1}') = 1 THEN '{1}' ELSE '0' END ) , @SEQ INT = CONVERT(INT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{2}') = 1 THEN '{2}' ELSE '0' END ) , @IMG_URL NVARCHAR(400) = N'{3}' , @TITLE NVARCHAR(200) = N'{4}' , @RELATION NVARCHAR(100) = N'{5}' , @CONTENT NVARCHAR(200) = N'{6}' , @REG_NAME NVARCHAR(200) = N'{7}' , @REMARK NVARCHAR(200) = N'{8}' , @INSERT_CODE INT = {9} , @INSERT_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE() , @UPDATE_CODE INT = {9} , @UPDATE_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE()
UPDATE A SET AD_CODE = @AD_CODE , SEQ = @SEQ , IMG_URL = @IMG_URL , TITLE = @TITLE , RELATION = @RELATION , CONTENT = @CONTENT , REG_NAME = @REG_NAME , REMARK = @REMARK , UPDATE_CODE = @UPDATE_CODE , UPDATE_DATE = @UPDATE_DATE FROM T_AD_SUB A WHERE IDX= @IDX IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN if(@SEQ = 0) BEGIN SELECT @SEQ = (ISNULL(MAX(SEQ),0) + 1) FROM T_AD_SUB WHERE AD_CODE = @AD_CODE END
INSERT INTO T_AD_SUB ( AD_CODE , SEQ , IMG_URL , TITLE , RELATION , CONTENT , REG_NAME , REMARK , INSERT_CODE , INSERT_DATE , UPDATE_CODE , UPDATE_DATE ) SELECT @AD_CODE , @SEQ , @IMG_URL , @TITLE , @RELATION , @CONTENT , @REG_NAME , @REMARK , @INSERT_CODE , @INSERT_DATE , @UPDATE_CODE , @UPDATE_DATE END
UPDATE T_AD SET CONTENT_TYPE = 2 WHERE AD_CODE = @AD_CODE SET NOCOUNT OFF
